attributes.title: Absolutely unhelpful
attributes.review:
This app is completely not helpful at all. Every time I open it it takes about ten minutes to load and glitches so so bad. Also, it keeps on deleting itself from my apps. Anytime I want to look at it, it has deleted and I have to re download it from the App Store. The information on this app is watered down and offers no actual facts so itâ€™s not really worth it. I deleted it within a week. I can learn more about Donald Trump on tik tok, rest assured. Please DO NOT waste time on this app, it is unhelpful and completely ridiculous. I want nothing to do with it anymore. An utter disgrace. Terrible, really. 

-Dissatisfied user
